description: landscape scene with valley with winding river in center; rising tree covered hill on right; plowed fields to left of river; arching tree on left; two figures, one holds parasol in LRC; printed on gray paper
inscription: LLC, in margin, in pencil: origional al. {illeg} | ULC, in pencil: Drgo
provenance: (Steven Thomas, Woodstock, Vt., until 2003, sold to Chambers); (William McWillie Chambers, Catskill, N.Y., 2003-17; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-19)
signed: LLC, in margin, in pencil: C. Thiemann
text: This woodcut, printed on gray paper, is striking for the way Carl Thiemann openly incorporated the wood grain into the upper sky. Such an undisguised use of natural materials was a hallmark of the Arts and Crafts era.
title: Overlook (Ausblick)
